title: PBE for All
body:
Hi, I'm a Brazilian server player, I do not speak English, so this text can get a bit confusing, sorry.
So, I wanted to know WHEN players of the Brazilian server (not only Brazilian as well as several others) will be able to register in the PBE with their own account, since it is almost impossible to create an account in NA and play with 190 ~ 260 to ping in the end, When you reach level 30, nor be sure that your account at PBE will be guaranteed.
Almost all the people that have the account in the PBE here in the Brazilian server, are largely youtubers / streamer or people who are very old playing.
Basically I was wondering if someday we'll have any chance, I hope you understood my mediocre English

replies.body: Since the pbe servers are only located in NA at the moment, anyone who usually plays on a different server is going to have a little higher than normal ping. This is simply because you're physically located further away, and there's not much we can do on that matter. You can look over our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) for all the those server details.
